summary: Saberlights: Wear a Saberlight Ring to create a glowing light to compliment Magicka Sabers or just cuz you want to glow! When wearing a SaberLight ring if your weapon is drawn you will cast a colored light.  If your weapon is sheathed the light goes out.
descriptionHtml:
[size=14]Paingod\'s [b]Saber[color=blue]L[/color][color=green]i[/color][color=red]g[/color][color=yellow]h[/color][color=pink]t[/color][color=purple]s[/color][/b] for Magicka Sabers[/size] 
or just cuz you want to glow!

[size=12]UPDATE Version 1.2[/size] 
SaberLights are now enchanted rings and can be found in a chest in the Riften market circle. (see screenshots)  Now when wearing a SaberLight ring if your weapon is drawn the light is on, if your weapon is sheathed the light is off.  To change the color of your light just put on the different color ring!  No messing around with the .esp files anymore.  Ring Enchantments create a glowing effect to your immediate area with a glowing light emitting from you.  Made to compliment Magicka Sabers by Lord Haun [http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3174].

I have left the spell based version as 1.0 if you would like to use it as a spell instead.   

YOU DO NOT NEED TO HAVE MAGICKA SABERS this will work when any weapon is drawn. 

[size=12]INSTALLATION[/size] 

1:Download with NMM or Manually. 

2:Find the SaberLight chest in Riften Market Circle (see Screenshot). OR

In your console type \"help saberlight\".  Look for the for the SaberLight rings you want and then type \"player.additem ########\" and enter.

3: Enjoy your glowing surroundings.


Thank you to...

Candlelight Toggle by Modinn http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11008
Magicka Sabers by Lord Haun http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3174
